results.firPara: Portugal tasted glory, France were left to rue a missed opportunity, Wales are excited about the World Cup qualifiers and Ukraine have little to shout about
results.secPara: It wont come as a massive shock to learn that Ive enjoyed this tournament. The team didnt really get going in Group F but I was thrilled with the Portugal performances in the knock-out stages. I was in Lens for the Croatia game in the second round. It is widely regarded as the worst game of the tournament but it wasnt boring for the Portuguese fans inside the stadium.
results.webTitle: Euro 2016: 24 fans from 24 countries give their verdicts on the tournament

results.firPara: Bradford City have signed the Blackpool goalkeeper Colin Doyle for £1, after activating a release clause in the players contract.
results.secPara: The 31-year-old has agreed a two-year deal with Bradford after just one season at Blackpool.
results.webTitle: Bradford City activate release clause to sign Blackpool’s Colin Doyle for £1

results.firPara: Hosting Euro 2020 in 13 cities across the continent and using the Uefa Nations League as part of the qualifying process mean it will feel very different from the tournament in France – and not necessarily for the better
results.secPara: Like all tournaments, it feels suddenly over far too soon. Euro 2016 isnt going to go down as a classic overall, but it had the incredible stories of Wales and Iceland, some brilliant goals, and the most ridiculous penalty shootout you are ever likely to see between two of the heavyweights of the international game.
results.webTitle: Euro 2020: get ready for games from Bilbao to Baku and more minnows

results.firPara: Watfords squad have been instructed to stay at a hotel during July by the new coach, Walter Mazzarri, in an attempt to gel before the Premier League season.
results.secPara: The players have stayed at Sopwell House in St Albans, Hertfordshire, since meeting Mazzarri at the start of last week.
results.webTitle: Watford squad ordered to stay in hotel for pre-season by Walter Mazzarri

results.firPara: Wayne Rooney has said working under José Mourinho will give him extra motivation.
results.secPara: Mourinho takes charge of United for the first time on Saturday when they travel to Wigan Athletic in their first pre-season fixture. While Rooney is not available as he is on a break following Euro 2016, he will return in time for the clubs summer tour to China when the captain is relishing teaming-up with the 53-year-old.
results.webTitle: Wayne Rooney: working with José Mourinho will give me extra motivation

results.firPara: How do we make sense of Euro 2016? Portugal won a strange tournament thanks to a striker who was dire at Swansea. Our writers picked their standout moments yesterday and you added your views in the comments. Now its polling time
results.secPara: How do we make sense of Euro 2016? Portugal won a strange tournament thanks to a striker who was dire at Swansea. Our writers picked their standout moments yesterday and you added your views in the comments. Now its polling time
results.webTitle: Euro 2016: vote for the best goal, game, player, team and biggest disappointment

results.firPara: The USA stoppers homecoming has boosted the Rapids ticket sales, and hes eager to show he can win in a league thats much better than it was when he left
results.secPara: The USA stoppers homecoming has boosted the Rapids ticket sales, and hes eager to show he can win in a league thats much better than it was when he left
results.webTitle: Tim Howard happy to be back in MLS after more than a decade away

results.firPara: Games of cut-and-thrust, with two teams going at each other, were almost nonexistent as we too often witnessed a slow bicycle race of non-possession
results.secPara: So, its over then, the worst of the 15 European Championships to date, a tournament so bereft of quality that Waless mildly diverting win over an inept Belgium was raised to the status of minor classic. Of 51 games, perhaps one, Frances victory over Germany, will be remembered by neutrals – and it, in truth, was utterly unrepresentative of the rest of the tournament.
results.webTitle: The Question: was Euro 2016 the death of possession football? | Jonathan Wilson

results.firPara: Its busy-busy at Manchester United, as José Mourinho busies himself undoing the achievements of his predecessors. Ruthlessly, he has decided that the squad can do without the pace of Daley Blind, the robustness of Bastian Schweinsteiger, the jeans of Marcos Rojo and the hugs of Juan Mata, putting all four up for sale; Matas blog is now an early favourite for a 2017 Pulitzer.
results.secPara: And, it seems, Everton have joined the race for the latters services; Mata himself was easily shrugged aside by the starting gun. Breathing down their necks are Villarreal, who have generously agreed to take the player on loan.
results.webTitle: Football transfer rumours: Blind, Rojo, Mata and Schweinsteiger leaving Manchester United?

results.firPara: Deep historical differences, feuds, fights, common players and managers, genuine competitiveness – Nick Miller delves into what feeds great rivalries and why they are such an important component of the English game
results.secPara: Deep historical differences, feuds, fights, common players and managers, genuine competitiveness –  Nick Miller delves into what feeds great rivalries and why they are such an important component of the English game
results.webTitle: Premier League rivalries unravelled: a history of English football derbies | Nick Miller
